title: Awesome Geek Podcasts
description: A curated list of podcasts we like to listen to. Old/Original list.

podcasts.name: .NET Rocks!
podcasts.description: The internet audio talk show for .NET developer with Carl Franklin and Richard Campbell.

podcasts.name: /dev/hell
podcasts.description: Chris Hartjes and Ed Finkler are trapped in Development Hell, where they talk mostly about PHP, web, their development experiences and also with special guests.

podcasts.name: Laravel Portugal Live
podcasts.description: Os membros do Laravel Portugal reunem-se para falar sobre Laravel, PHP, a comunidade Portuguesa, ideias e muito mais. @joselaborges
